Quick Change Production Tooling

Quick change tooling for production of IC chips. Includes bayonet mount with adjustable latch force and high precision placement control. Quick disconnect fluid and electrical connections automatically engage and seal when inserted. Mating support module provides controlled lift speed profile and precision placement of chip for processing.

Mitech Systems, Ltd.

Mechanical Engineering/Machine Design

Sunbury, Ohio
